ygData.subject: Re: Pixie strike petition (was Stats 101)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, it was added to the song.  It was not originally a part of the song.  I didn t notice it though until well after I felt PS was much less effective, so
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 25 Jan 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:
>
> PS Can someone confirm when the MR debuff aspect of pixie strike was added
> to the song? IIRC, some of you have posted that it was not originally a
> part of the song but was secretly added with a patch a few months ago.

Yes, it was added to the song. It was not originally a part
of the song. I didn't notice it though until well after I
felt PS was much less effective, so I can't say if it's the
cause.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
